name: happy-vscode-extension
description: Bridge Happy with VS Code chat sessions.

happy.vscode.daemonBaseUrl.description: Override daemon base URL (e.g. http://127.0.0.1:8420). Leave empty to read daemon.state.json.

happy.vscode.daemonHttpPort.description: Override daemon HTTP port. Leave 0 to read daemon.state.json.

happy.vscode.daemonStatePath.description: Override path to daemon.state.json. Leave empty to use HAPPY_HOME_DIR or ~/.happy.

happy.vscode.autoStartDaemon.description: Automatically start the Happy daemon if it is not running.

happy.vscode.scanIntervalMs.description: Interval for scanning VS Code chat sessions.

happy.vscode.heartbeatIntervalMs.description: Interval for sending heartbeat to the Happy daemon.

happy.vscode.commandPollIntervalMs.description: Interval for polling commands from the Happy daemon.

happy.vscode.chatSendTarget.description: Where to send chat commands: open the session in an editor tab, or keep input in the Chat sidebar/panel.
